Course Name: ACG 4254 - INTERNATIONAL FINANCIAL REPORTING STANDARDS II (IFRS)
Course Description: THIS COURSE PROVIDES STUDENTS WITH ADDITIONAL INTERNATIONAL FINANCIAL REPORTING STANDARDS (IFRS) KNOWLEDGE INCLUDING FINANCIAL REPORTING DISCLOSURES, PRESENTATIONS AND THE ADOPTION OF IFRS. ETHICAL CONDUCT AS IT RELATES TO INTERNATIONAL ACCOUNTING CONCEPTS IS ALSO COVERED.
Transfer Status: GUARANTEED TRANSFER TO INSTITUTION OFFERING SAME COURSE.
